attributes.action: We the public want Michael Doherty to take over control of the IPCC.
attributes.additional_details:
We the public want Michael Doherty to take over control of the IPCC.

It is in the public interest for Michael Doherty to become the head of the Independent Police Complaints so confidence can be restored with the public and justice can be served.


Derek Canning LLB [hons]
